bio.short: Brandy specializes in fitting a style to your personality. Getting the right combination of cut and color is an art and this is her gift.
bio.long: After completing her initial cosmetology education with Aveda in Minneapolis, Brandy completed intensive advanced training at Vidal Sassoon in Santa Monica, CA.  Additionally she completed comprehensive training at the premier Aveda concept salon in the Twin Cities.  She continually seeks to further her craft.

bio.short: Every time I get done working with a client and they feel beautiful, that’s when I know I chose the right career.
bio.long: I have been in the beauty industry all my life, learning from my parents who owned a salon as well as my father, a stylist. I love using my life-long experience in the business to serve my clients to my full potential.

services.name: Tape In Hair Extentions By Consultation Only

bio.short: Nobody wants you to reach your skin goals as much as Heidi does. From full body waxing to results driven facial treatments, her mission is to help everyone leave the treatment room looking and feeling amazing!
bio.long: After completing her esthetics education with the Aveda Institute in Minneapolis, Heidi began her career within a salon and spa with an emphasis in advanced education training. This training and her extensive time in the industry has helped her learn to cater to individual goals and needs. She is always wanting to learn and advance her skills to offer her guests the best services and experiences.

bio.short: I love working with you to find a style that works for you and your lifestyle.
bio.long: This has always been my passion and  I feel very grateful to have it as my career. I love pixies and long layered cuts.  After completing my initial cosmetology education I continued my education with Juut and was there for 11 years. I'm always continuing my education to stay up to date and inspired.

bio.short: Ann specializes in creating movement and shine for your best, most effortless styles.
bio.long: I have been a salon professional since 2004. I value helping my clients feel as comfortable styling their own hair as I feel styling hair behind the chair. My focus as a stylist is to customize every look to compliment each client’s lifestyle and unique beauty features. I enjoy working with natural texture as well as creating texture to help minimize everyday styling struggles. I have been a Wella Colorist since 2012. The technology in creating seamless, radiant colors without disrupting the health or texture of hair continues to amaze me. There’s no greater feeling than walking out of the salon with a fresh, vibrant, healthy color! Come take a seat in my chair and I'll take care of your hair!

services.name: partial balayage / foil with root tint
full balayage / foil with root tint

bio.short: Atty has been in the salon business since 1990 and a nail tech since 1998.  She takes pride in her attention to detail and providing a relaxing and clean environment for her clients.
bio.long: Proudly using: Dazzle Dry Nail Polish.  Non-toxic, ten to fourteen day wear, dries in 5 minutes.  Removes with regular polish remover.

bio.short: I love being creative and making my clients look and feel beautiful. I am a master of all colors, but I specialize in blondes.
bio.long:
I have a passion for working with my clients to find the unique color that fits their style and showcases their personality. I love seeing the look on my clients face after a fresh look.
Graduated from the Aveda institute in 2000. I have worked as a colorist for 17 years. I have worked with many color lines including Aveda, Davines, Matrix, and L’Oréal professional.

bio.short: I have a passion for developing a lasting relationship with my clients that goes beyond the chair.  This allows me to create hairstyles that not only reflect their personalities, but lifestyles as well.
bio.long: I have been working in Minneapolis since graduating Aveda Institute in 2005.  Along with offering all cutting and coloring services, and special occasion/bridal hair, I am also a certified Great Lengths Extension provider. I have been working with the premier extension company since the beginning of my career, so if you want as little as a trim or a major transformation I can help you. The bonus for me, is when an organic connection with a client blossoms and I truly believe that when that happens, that's where some of the most beautiful hair is found.

bio.short: After being in the beauty industry for 20 years, I love keeping up with current trends, but I’m really passionate about haircolor that looks flattering and beautiful.
bio.long: After being in the beauty industry for 20 years, I love keeping up with current trends, but I’m really passionate about haircolor that looks flattering and beautiful.  I tailor the color to the client’s maintenance needs and long term hair goals for color that looks effortless and fresh.Since graduating from the Aveda Institute, I have kept current with the latest trends and love to play around with color.  I am an expert at corrective color and love to formulate a plan to make the transition as easy as possible, for you and the integrity of your hair.  And of course, I couldn’t be a hair colorist in Minnesota if I didn’t LOVE blondes!!!    Icy or golden, foils or balayage, natural or bold.  I use a color line called All-Nutrient, which doesn’t contain sulfates, parabens, phthalates and many other harmful ingredients that are found in traditional haircolor, but still delivers gorgeous, long-lasting color.

name: nicole
title: esthetician • makeup artist • massage therapist  | mpls

bio.short: Nicole offers a full range of skin care, waxing, massage and make up services, in the salon as well as onsite for weddings and photoshoots.
bio.long: Nicole Twito of Nicole Twito Beauty is an Esthetician, Massage Therapist and Makeup Artist with 8 years experience. After graduating from the Aveda Institute Minneapolis in 2011, Nicole worked in prestigious Aveda concept salons, brow boutiques, and luxury salon spas while launching her independent makeup career. She continues to pursue education in advanced esthetic practices.Nicole has worked at New York Fashion Week on the Aveda runway makeup team for 3 seasons, worked with hundreds of brides and bridal parties and enjoys making every woman look and feel their most relaxed and beautiful. She has a holistic approach to beauty and believes that no matter the service, it should leave you feeling refreshed. She has had a lifelong love for people, skin care and beauty.You can find her at Petite Salon offering a full range of skin care, wax, massage and make up services, as well as onsite for weddings and photoshoots. When not in the salon, you can find her cuddling her rescue chihuahuas or visiting local coffee shops.

bio.short: As a haircut specialist for 19 yrs, my mission is to create low maintenance hair with tons of style! I listen to the clients needs and create the perfect look to work with their hair and lifestyle.
long: I love to do short hair, modern bobs, and long layered haircuts. I specialize in razor cuts, low maintenance hair styles, thick, and curly/wavy hair.

19+ years experience in the industry, starting at the premier Aveda salon in Minneapolis Educator and mentor Advanced training classes with Vivianne Mackinder, Nick Arrojo, and Ruth Roche, as well as many others.

policies.name: Cancellation // Reschedule Policy
policies.content: I understand that things come up and schedules change. If you need to cancel or reschedule your appointment, please give me at least 24 hrs notice. This gives me time to contact anyone on my wait list and fill your time slot. If you cancel less than 24 hrs prior to your appointment, you will be charged 50% of your scheduled appointment. You will NOT be charged in the case of illness (esp Covid related) or dangerous driving conditions due to weather. Be sure to communicate that.

policies.name: No Show Policy
policies.content:
I understand that emergencies and accidents happen. If you are unable to come in for your scheduled appointment, please let me know as soon as possible. No-call and no-shows will be charged 100% of their missed appointment.

You will NOT be charged in the case of illness (esp Covid related) or dangerous driving conditions due to weather. Be sure to communicate that.

policies.name: Late Policy
policies.content: If you are running late, please let me know as soon as possible. If you arrive more than 15 min late we may not be able to perform all scheduled services.

policies.name: Appointment Deposit
policies.content: I am now requiring a deposit of 20% to secure an appointment, this amount will be deducted from your total day of service.

bio.short: Jacquie specializes in naturally curly hair.  She takes a unique freehand approach to create effortless style, setting free your curls to fall naturally framing your face.
bio.long: She launched her career in the early 90's focusing in on education and inspiration.  She believes hair is an organic extension of your personality and is inspired by nature and its patterns, vintage shopping, modern art & music.

bio.short: My specialty is tailoring haircuts to reveal the dynamic movement and texture in hair

Kacy loves taking the time to get to know her clients in order to give you your best cut and color. She specializes in balayage and dry cutting, aiming for effortless style, but she also enjoys and is educated in many different cutting and coloring techniques to fit your taste!
bio.long: After graduating from a Sassoon connection school in 2009, she moved to Austin, Texas. There she apprenticed and worked as a stylist for over 10 years. In Austin she mastered her dry cutting and balayage skills. She has taken classes with and educator from Jacques Dessange in Paris, attended classes at the hair color energy summit in LA, and more. Now she's back in her home state and ready to help you with all your hair needs!

name: dani ryan
title: master esthetician + brazilian wax pro | mpls

bio.short: Dani specializes in speed waxing, brow design + lamination, skincare and select lash services
bio.long:
After graduating from Aveda-Mpls in 2010, Dani has tried her hand in several realms of esthetics, including med-spas, wax studios + salons/spas and for the last five years, owning an esthetics studio in Denver.

She moved to home to the Twin Cities with my husband and son in 2021 and am looking forward to growing my business here.

I bring advanced education and certifications in full-body speed waxing, goal focused skincare, brow lamination and lash lifting.

With over a decade in the industry, I offer skilled and thorough services every time!
